user_question: How does 5G technology impact the development of smart cities, and can you generate an image of a futuristic smart city utilizing 5G?
final_answer: 5G technology significantly impacts smart cities by enabling faster data transfer, supporting IoT devices, enhancing real-time communication, and improving infrastructure management. Image of a futuristic smart city utilizing 5G generated.
